alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 2:47AM EST until January 07 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations up to 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of the central Sheandoah Valley and the Blue Ridge Mountains. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact evening commute Thursday as well as the morning commute Friday. Snow covered and slippery roads are possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
